title: Popilush Shapewear Dress Sparkly Cocktail Dresses for Women Tummy Control Square Neck Ruched Formal Midi Dress Side Slit
description: Versatile Styling Design: Turn heads effortlessly with the Popilush sparkly cocktail dress with built in shapewear. Designed for any occasion, from daytime outings to glamorous evenings, cocktail parties, formal events, or casual wear, this dress merges style with comfort. Pair it with heels and a clutch for a show-stopping look, or layer it with jackets and other wardrobe staples for versatile styling

Elegant Square Neckline, Ruched and Side Slit Design: The stylish square neckline enhances your fashion sense and adds a touch of sophistication to your look. The ruched details at the waist and abdomen, combined with a built-in body shaper, offer double coverage to conceal abdominal fat and create a slimmer silhouette. The adjustable side slit design elongates the legs while adding a hint of sexiness

Lightweight, Sparkly Stretch Fabric: This highly elastic, sparkly fabric offers exceptional softness, texture, and stretchability, while also providing great drape. It allows for free movement, hugging the curves of the body to create a flattering silhouette. With its subtle shine and luxurious texture, this fall cocktail dress is the ideal choice for exuding confidence, allure, and a fashionable vibe

Unique Tech for Tummy Control and Body Shaping: This sparkly cocktail dress is not just your regular outfit, it is also a built in shapewear dress crafted with exclusive shaping and fabric technology, and eliminating the need for a bra or underwear. Designed for women, this shaper dress tightens your core, lifts your bust, smooths your abdomen, and enhances your buttocks, accentuating your curves effortlessly

Must-have Detail: We have meticulously designed every aspect of this fall cocktail dress. The rubber band under the bust provides better breast support, laser-cut foot openings minimize visible wear marks, and the overlapping crotch design offers convenience during restroom breaks. Made with cotton-infused fabric on the crotch, this dress ensures breathability and comfort, allowing you to stay cool and relaxed
